ComicInfo.Title: 12 Dysfunctional Toys for Dynsfunctional Kids; 007 - Plasticeye; One Day on the Mean Streets; Cracked Superhero Makeovers; A Cracked Peek at Monday Night Football; The Case of the Seven Dead Dwarfs; Winter TV Replacement Shows; Without ____, We'd Never...; What If Every Game Was Like Jumanji?; Bizarre Combos!; The Sky Divers; Cracked Looks at Schools in the 90's; Reindeer Games; Oy, Whatta Story; Meet the McPoops
